titles.title: A resolution to amend paragraphs 2 and 3 of Rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Amends rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate to increase the membership on the Senate Committees on Armed Services from 20 to 22, Foreign Relations from 19 to 20, and Small Business from 21 to 22.
